metadata.name: solmail_escrow
metadata.description: Escrow program for SolMail incentivized replies

docs: The escrow program powering SolMail's incentivized replies.
Step 1: we only scaffold the data structures and a no-op initialize
instruction so you can ensure the program compiles and deploys.
In the next step we will wire in real SOL transfers and the 15-day expiry.

instructions.name: initialize_placeholder
docs: Placeholder initialize instruction so you can test build/deploy wiring.
